text: Rikard Spets (born March 19, 1971 in Trondheim) is a Norwegian writer from Sandefjord.Anders Mehlum Hasle."- Ekstra moro med lokal forfatter!" - Sandefjords Blad He debuted in 2011 with the crime novel Allahs tårer."Rikard Spets" - Juritzen Forlag Spets graduated in marketing and worked as a sales and marketing until in 2007 he resigned to pursue his dream of becoming a writer. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian male writers
